entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023
